channel.title: msbuild on Cezary Piątek Blog
channel.description: Recent content in msbuild on Cezary Piątek Blog

item.title: Managing output in the .NET SDK projects
item.description: With the new SDK format for .NET projects, it’s much easier to manage with the project’s dependencies. In most scenarios references added with standard mechanism (Visual Studio or dotnet cli) result in sufficient content in the output directory. However, sometimes we want to do something non-standard that requires a slightly different set of components in the output dir - simply speaking we expect to see there either more or fewer files.
